resources.string: Step 1: Choose Category of Image You Want to Classify!
Step 2: Get Image of Category You Want to Classify!
Step 3: Press \"â–·\" to Start Live Image Classification!

These image classifiers were trained on an image dataset called ImageNet and can classify from over 1000 categories! MobileNet is a smaller model that is decently accurate and makes extremely fast predictions. Inception is a much bigger model that is more accurate than MobileNet, but the prediction time is much longer as a result.

These image classifiers were trained on non-general image datasets to classify categories in a specific subject, such as dog breeds or flowers types. These models tend to have good accuracy and fast prediction times because they classify much fewer categories than the general classification models.
